Stephina then floats over to her bedroom door, and actually flies THROUGH the door! You hear a clicking sound as she unlocks the it. Then nothing... You stand in place for a while, waiting for her to come back out. Suddenly, you feel yourself being lifted off the ground! You look down to see Stephina's head rising out of the floor below you, followed by the rest of her body. Were shocked, and your face went pale...

"What's wrong? You look like you've seen a ghost!" Stephina joked.

"Haha, very funny... Seriously though, don't do that! You almost gave me a heart attack with that stunt!"

"Well, let's get going. I have something to show you..."

Stephina then goes to her room again, walking this time, and opens the door. As you sat on her head, the sight you saw almost made you fall backward and onto the cold ground below. Lying on Stephina's bed was... Stephina! Well, her corpse anyway... She looked like she had never even been touched, and despite being dead for over fifty years, her body looked just as young and beautiful as the ghost that you knew her as.

"Stephina? Is that... You? But how? You look like you haven't aged a day!"

"Yes, that's me... As for how my body is so well preserved, well... When I became a ghost, I gained several magical abilities. I was able to protect my body from the test of time with it. I just wouldn't have felt right if I allowed myself to rot away on that bed..."

"And I'm guessing that this magic of yours is how you shrank me, too?"

"Yep! And it's how I'm going to change you back later... But I want to have some fun with you first. Just promise that you won't tell anyone about my secret, or else you'll be joining me!"

Although this last comment scared you slightly, you trusted her enough to know that she wouldn't harm you if you kept your mouth shut.

"Don't worry, I promise that I won't tell a soul! Hehe... Sorry... that was probably offensive to you, huh..."

Stephina simply laughed at your comment.

"Oh no, not at all! I actually found it pretty funny!"

"Okay, well that's good... I would want to get on your bad side, or else I wouldn't stand a ghost of a chance..."

"Okay, that's enough of that! Anyway, I'll admit that that was funny, but please don't get into the habit of making ghost jokes like that... It makes me feel awkward..."

"Oh, sorry Steph... So, what do you want to do now?"

Nonetheless she chose you. That was about three months ago. Since then you’ve lived with Stephina, paying for your half of the food you ate, the water you used, and of course the space you occupied. But she still locked her room whenever she left the apartment. Aside from meals and meeting in front of the bathroom each morning, Stephina spent most of her time in the apartment in her room, away from any prying eyes. When she was out of her room but still in the apartment she was friendly with you but seemed a bit distant.

You had gotten off work early today, so you were sitting on the couch in the main room watching the television. A few hours passed before Stephina walked in from her room. “Turn off the TV, would you?” She asked as she sat down beside you. You did as she asked and stood up straighter, she seemed excited about something. “Well, as you know we’ve lived together here for a few months.” She stated, smiling like a kid with a new toy.

“Yeah, we have.” You replied, not sure where she was going with this.

“Yep. And in that time, I’ve never really been completely honest with you.” Stephina said without dropping her smile.

“What do you mean?” You asked, wondering what she apparently was about to admit.

“You’ll see” Stephina giggled before you suddenly blacked out.


You woke up later in what you soon realized was your shirt. You somehow had been shrunk! Though your outer garments were apparently unchanged, your underwear somehow shrunk with you. Your best guess was that you were about 2 inches tall. “Ah you’re awake, good.” You hear Stephina’s voice boomed, though you couldn’t see her through the shirt fabric. “Well my ‘little’ friend, as you’ll see when I get you out of there I’m really _____________” Stephina said as she pulled you’re shirt up, causing you to land on the couch fabric where you were once sitting.

If you become my apprentice, I'll teach you everything that I know." "Sounds good. It's a deal!" you shout happily. "Oh, uhh, will I ever be able to go back home? There are some things I'd like to do back there with the magic that I learn." "Like what?" Stephina asks. "Well...how do you feel about people usi g magic to get revenge on others who've wronged them?" you ask a little nervously. "Are you kidding? I could tell you stories of some of the things I've done to people who abused me, but some of it'd give you nightmares!" she laughed.

"Okay. Uhm, I have another question. Why did you shrink me?" "Oh, that. I, I wanted someone from your world to come here with me, to talk to. As you can see, this world is rather primitive, technologically. I wanted someone who could understand the things I talk to them about. After all, I could hardly expect to talk about computers or airliners with the ignorant retards out there," she said, pointing to the cottages. "Is that all?" you ask curiously. "Well, no," she says, then pauses. She fidgets for a bit, then blurts out, "I fell in love with you!" Your jaw nearly hits the floor. "You, what?" "I fell in love with you. I didn't even think I COULD love anyone, but when I first saw you..." "Oh my god, I thought that love at first sight thing was a myth!" "And honest-to-gods witches are any better?" she asks a little ironically. "Well, no," you admit.

You ponder what she's revealed to you. You never thought about falling in love with another woman, but you and your best friend Alice DID have a short-lived sexual relationship shortly before you went off to college. And Stephina was a total babe. All in all, you decide things could be FAR worse. Most any straight guy would just about kill to get with her, and most women would kill to LOOK like her. "Well, how could I refuse an invitation like that?" you reply. Stephina let's out a huge sigh of relief. "I was afraid that if I told you, it would freak you out or s are you away," she admitted. "Oh, and, yes, you would be able to go back, with the proper training. After all, I want to go back myself. Aside from the lack of magic, your world is far more interesting than this one." "Really? I think it's the other way around." "Well, perhaps it's a case of the other man's grass being greener'" she pointed out cogently. "Just out of curiosity, what did you have in mind to do when you went back?" "Well..."
12331111.title: You bet!

124.content:
"What do you mean?" You ask, a little afraid. If she was being honest, then you definitely didn't want to make her mad.

"Why, I'm the goddess of shrinking. I find humans that won't be noticed if they vanish, and I have my way with them. I will take either gender, but I love female humans. However, shrunken humans don't last more than a year. I doubt you will be different, unless . . ." She picks you up and hesitates to continue.

"Unless what?" You ask. However, you're not sure if you want the answer.

"You could become a willing slave. If you did, you may last longer than others."

"I . . I don't know." You said hesitantly.

"Well you think about it, in the meantime, let's go to my bedroom." She hums while carrying you. In the bedroom, there is a large purple bed, a refrigerator and a small closet. As she takes you to her bed, you pass by the closet, getting a good view of it. There are a lot of shoes in the closet. There are also plenty of outfits to wear.

"Why so many outfits? Do you love to dress up while you have fun?" Stephina drops you on her pillow.

"Yep, I love to act. Some of my suits include batgirl, a cat suit, magician, a mermaid outfit and many others, each one gives me a special ability. For instance, with my batgirl suit, I can fly with ease. With my mermaid outfit, I can breathe underwater. I even have suits for tiny humans. Some of those include mouse costume, fairy costume, even a cupcake costume, there are many others, and when humans put them on, they'll turn into whatever they look like." You get comfortable on the pillow and look up at her.

"Does the normal outfit you currently are wearing have an ability? Another thing I want to know is do you have an ability when you aren't wearing anything?" She kneels down to your height and brings her face close to you.

"Yes." She says seductively. "In my normal outfit, I can make myself look like any human I have seen. As for my nudity, humans will be forced to listen to me, even if they are female. They'll lose utter control over themselves until I put clothes on, so you better listen to me." The expression you're giving her makes her laugh.

"So, what did you want to do?" You ask, quickly changing the subject.
124.title: The goddess of shrinking

info.brief_description: The girl you share an apartment with is more than what she seems. Please Add
info.description:
Roommates can be very odd people sometimes. But little is odder than when yours shrinks you and then has her way with you.


If you add, which I hope you do, I'd like you to follow these guidelines:
1. No toilet stuff!
2. No giant males
3. At least try to use proper spelling and grammar
4. Try for at least a paragraph (You can do one-liners for choice chapters but you should then do one of those choices)
5. No anal stuff please (She can sit on you, but that's as far as I'd like it to go)
6. swears and cusses are allowed to a degree

Other than that, go nuts!

*Note though: I reserve the right to edit and/or delete chapters as I see fit*
